level.text: If the Director or designee finds that an applicant for a license has the required qualifications, he or she shall issue the license.

When the Director issues a salesperson’s license, the Director shall register the licensee as a salesman for the licensed dealer or dealers who certified the application, and issue to the licensee an identification card on which shall be set forth the salesman’s license number and the name and business address of each licensed dealer employing that salesperson. One of the photographs required by ยง 302.3 shall be attached to the identification card.

When the Director issues a automobile repossessor’s license, the Director shall also issue to the licensee an identification card to which one of the photographs required by ยง 302.3 shall be attached.
